snippet.title: Spaceman Defender
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1110200/Spaceman_Defender/

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/spaceman-defender-757ebf

Microsoft: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9nn1l5dpz0xd

Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/LoadUpGames-com-Spaceman-Defender/dp/B07TV8PZHP

Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.loadupgames.spacemandefender


A New Space Shooter Arcade Game!

Defend these Little Spaceman Dudes from Aliens!

Blast your way through waves of Alien Abductors and UFOs while defending Spaceman Dudes from being abducted in this fast-paced 80’s style arcade game. 

FEATURES

- A Modern Space Shooter Arcade Game.
- 50 Challenging Levels.
- Waves of Alien Abductors and UFOs.
- Spaceman Dudes that will THANK YOU!
- Arcade High Scores.
- Gamepad Support.


In Space, no one can hear the Little Spaceman Dudes scream… Except YOU!
